summary: Implemented a Light/Dark theme system with a header toggle and local persistence using a ThemeProvider + storage utilities. Also includes additional unrelated styling/config/page-title changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale global visual theme changes (warm parchment-themed OKLCH color system, typography, textures) beyond adding a dark-mode toggle.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a dark mode toggle using existing CSS variables in `frontend/src/index.css`, and explicitly said not to redesign overall layout beyond whatâ€™s necessary; the diff summary indicates broad styling/theme changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed HTML page title to "Achievement Power Counter".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-9/10/11 and unrelated to adding a dark mode toggle/persistence.
